question: Analyze the technology adoption trends in the healthcare industry across different companies.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the healthcare industry and extract relevant company metadata such as name, revenue, and employee count.
Gather information regarding the technologies used by identified healthcare companies to analyze their tech stacks.
Collect data on vendor technology services provided to healthcare companies, focusing on service type and deal value to evaluate adoption trends.
Examine social media presence and engagement of these healthcare companies to gauge public interaction and response to their adopted technologies.
